sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Cloud, CloudRain, Sun, CloudSnow, CloudFog, X, Navigation } from 'lucide-react'; const WeatherApp = () => { const [cities, setCities] = useState([ { id: 1, name: 'Colombo, LK', temp: 27, condition: 'Few Clouds', description: 'Few Clouds', pressure: '1018', humidity: '78', visibility: '8.0', windSpeed: '4.0', windDeg: '120', sunrise: '6:05am', sunset: '6:05am', tempMin: 25, tempMax: 28, color: 'blue' }, { id: 2, name: 'Tokyo, JP', temp: 7, condition: 'Broken Clouds', description: 'Broken Clouds', pressure: '1018', humidity: '78', visibility: '8.0', windSpeed: '4.0', windDeg: '120', sunrise: '6:05am', sunset: '6:05am', tempMin: -7, tempMax: 7, color: 'purple' }, { id: 3, name: 'Liverpool, GB', temp: -2, condition: 'Clear Sky', description: 'Clear Sky', pressure: '1018', humidity: '78', visibility: '8.0', windSpeed: '4.0', windDeg: '120', sunrise: '6:05am', sunset: '6:05am', tempMin: -2, tempMax: 5, color: 'green' }, { id: 4, name: 'Sydney, AU', temp: 26, condition: 'Light Rain', description: 'Light Rain', pressure: '1018', humidity: '78', visibility: '8.0', windSpeed: '4.0', windDeg: '120', sunrise: '6:05am', sunset: '6:05am', tempMin: 20, tempMax: 30, color: 'orange' }, { id: 5, name: 'Boston, US', temp: 13, condition: 'Mist', description: 'Mist', pressure: '1018', humidity: '78', visibility: '8.0', windSpeed: '4.0', windDeg: '120', sunrise: '6:05am', sunset: '6:05am', tempMin: 10, tempMax: 15, color: 'red' } ]); const [cityInput, setCityInput] = useState(''); const getWeatherIcon = (condition) => { const lower = condition.toLowerCase(); if (lower.includes('clear')) return ; if (lower.includes('rain')) return ; if (lower.includes('snow')) return ; if (lower.includes('mist') || lower.includes('fog')) return ; return ; }; const removeCity = (id) => { setCities(cities.filter(city => city.id !== id)); }; const getColorClasses = (color) => { const colors = { blue: 'from-blue-400 to-blue-500', purple: 'from-purple-500 to-purple-600', green: 'from-emerald-400 to-emerald-500', orange: 'from-orange-400 to-orange-500', red: 'from-red-400 to-red-500' }; return colors[color] || colors.blue; }; return (

setCityInput(e.target.value)} className="px-6 py-3 w-80 rounded-lg bg-gray-800 text-white placeholder-gray-400 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-500" />

Temp Min: {city.tempMin}¬∞c

Temp Max: {city.tempMax}¬∞c

{/* Bottom Section - Dark Details */}
{/* Row 1 */}

Pressure: {city.pressure}hPa

{city.windSpeed}m/s {city.windDeg} Degree

Sunrise: {city.sunrise}

{/* Row 2 */}

Humidity: {city.humidity}%

Sunset: {city.sunset}

{/* Row 3 */}

Visibility: {city.visibility}km

))}
{/* Footer */}
2021 Fidenz Technologies
); }; export default WeatherApp;
